name: Shitty platformer (Beta 2)
description:
=====UPDATE!!!!!====

-Added more levels!!

-Added characters!

-Can now skip levels with 1 and 2 keys

-Added a mute button

Controls:

Up arrow = jump

Left arrow = move left

Right arrow = move right

down arrow = move down

We are still hoping to add more level

There will be more updates coming in the near future.

Hope you enjoy this game.
